remarks: Implication of a set being a constant polynomial matrix.  (Contributed by AV, 18-Nov-2019.)
statement:
cpmat.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
cpmat.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
cpmat.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
cpmat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cpmatelimp $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( M e. S -> ( M e. B /\ A. i e. N A. j e. N A. k e. NN ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` k ) = ( 0g ` R ) ) ) ) $.
$d M i j k $.
$d N i j k $.
$d R i j k $.
